item.title: Why Kdenlive Is The Best Free Video Editor?
item.description: Kdenlive is a free video editor. Today, Video editing is an important skill for content creators. The video editor is essential tool for video editing after editing skills. Kdenlive is free and open-source software for video editing. Kdenlive is lightweight and runs on 4GB ram only. Specification for Kdenlive: 1.Operating System = Windows 7 or newer Processor = 2 cores for SD video, 4 cores for HD video, and 8 cores for 4K video.
